title: Many Saved Tab Groups Vanish Suddenly
content:
Hey everyone!

So, I have an emergency issue...

I was using Firefox earlier today and for some reason, I don't remember why, but my computer had two "Firefoxes" at the same time—a closed one at its normal position on the dock and another "new" one that was opened to the right of the divider next to the trash can on the doc. It was probably some minor issue and I know sometimes my computer will open two of the same app simultaneously for games and stuff. However, here is where the issue begins. So, I, for some reason, moved the Firefox that was closed and at its normal position on the doc into the trash can and I moved the Firefox that was newly opened from the position right of the divider into the place where the original Firefox was. I then emptied the trash can. Later that day, I opened up Firefox as I usually would and went to check my saved tab groups and there was absolutely nothing there. I went on a few forums and listened to directions and input code into the Firefox console and still nothing turned up and nothing worked. It seems as though my extremely important and crucial saved tab groups are unrecoverable.

I would like to know what happened and how to recover my saved tab groups if possible. Thank you all for your help and taking time to read this message!
creator: blackemergence0930

title: Report: Number Not Going Live
content:
It has been observed that the contact number listed on the website www.parivartanfoundation.com is currently not going live. This issue is affecting users who are trying to reach out to the center for urgent assistance or inquiries related to addiction recovery.

Parivartan Foundation is a well-known Rehabilitation Centre in Delhi, offering essential services to individuals struggling with drug and alcohol dependency. However, the unavailability of a working contact number may create obstacles for those in need of immediate support.

The issue could be due to a technical error in the website’s clickable number format or a telecom-related problem. It is important for the foundation to address this at the earliest to ensure seamless communication for patients and their families.

Timely resolution of this issue will help restore user trust and maintain the foundation’s commitment to accessible and reliable de-addiction care in Delhi.

title: How to Speak Directly to a Representative at Coinbase: A Comprehensive Guide
content:
To speak directly with Coinbase support +1-808 [206]9330, log in to your Coinbase account and navigate to the Help section. From there, you can request live chat support or schedule a call with a customer service representative +1-808 [206]9330. Phone support +1-808 [206]9330is available for account-related issues, and chat is typically the fastest option for real-time help. 

You can speak directly with a Coinbase support agent through +1-808 [206]9330 either 24/7 in-app chat or phone support. US/Canada toll free: +1-808 [206]9330—available 24/7 for urgent issues like suspicious activity or account lockout . For other regions, Coinbase offers local language phone lines across the UK, Ireland, Germany, Spain, and more Note: Coinbase never makes outbound calls, so if someone calls you claiming to be them—even from the “right” number—it’s almost certainly a scam

If you need direct support from Coinbase due to account issues +1-808 [206]9330, unauthorized activity, or urgent help, here’s a step-by-step guide to help you reach a real person at Coinbase: ________________________________________ 1. Start with the Coinbase Help Center Go to https://help.coinbase.com • Use the search bar to look for your issue +1-808 [206]9330. • Many common problems can be resolved through their articles or automated tools +1-808 [206]9330. ________________________________________ 2. Use the Coinbase Virtual Assistant • Scroll to the bottom-right corner of the Help Center page +1-808 [206]9330. • Click the chat bubble to launch the virtual assistant. • Type in your issue+1-808 [206]9330. • If the bot can’t solve it, it will give you the option to contact support or escalate to a human agent +1-808 2069330. ________________________________________ 3. Request Live Chat Support • If you’re logged in and eligible, Coinbase may +1-808 [206]9330offer live chat with an agent. • Follow the prompts in the virtual assistant until you see the “Chat with a representative” option +1-808 [206]9330. • Chat is typically available during business hours for verified customers +1-808 [206]9330. ________________________________________ 4. Use the Coinbase Support Form If live chat isn’t available: • Visit: https://help.coinbase.com/en/contact-us+1-808 [206]9330 • Select the issue type and fill out the form. • +1-808 [206]9330 ________________________________________ 5. Call Coinbase Support (U.S. Only) Coinbase offers phone support for specific issues+1-808 [206]9330, like account security. As of now: • U.S. customers can call +1-808 [206]9330. • Be prepared to verify your identity. • Note: Phone support may be limited to account recovery+1-808 [206]9330 and fraud issues. For general help, chat or email support is preferred. ________________________________________ 6. Use the Coinbase App • Open the app. • Tap your profile icon > Help +1-808 [206]9330. • Follow prompts to get support or chat. ________________________________________ 7. Reach Out on Social Media (Cautiously) • Twitter/X: @CoinbaseSupport • Use only for public updates or to+1-808 [206]9330 bring attention to an open support ticket. • Never share sensitive info (passwords, full name, ID numbers) on social platforms +1-808 [206]9330. ________________________________________ Tips for a Faster Response • Use the same email as your Coinbase account when filling forms. • Describe the issue clearly and politely +1-808 [206]9330. • Include any case ID if you're following up.


Does Coinbase have 24/7 customer service? Urgent issues Yes—Coinbase now offers 24/7 customer service via phone +1-808 [206]9330, chat, and social media support. They provide a nonstop toll free support number +1-808 [206]9330 OR (1 888 908 7930) that’s staffed 24 hours a day, 7 days a week—available for urgent issues like account recovery or fraud (gethuman.com). Their in-product live messaging (chat) is also accessible around the clock, and if the virtual assistant can’+1-808 [206]9330 help, it connects you with a human agent (coinbase.pissedconsumer.com). For premium subscribers (Coinbase One), there is even dedicated 24/7 +1-808 [206]9330concierge support in multiple countries and languages (coinbase.com). Bottom line: Yes, you can contact Coinbase support anytime via phone or chat—though callback requests and non-urgent inquiries +1-808 [206]9330 may still follow business-hour procedures.


How do I get my money back from Gemini? To get your money back from Gemini, first sell any cryptocurrency and ensure USD is available. Then withdraw funds to your linked bank via ACH (4–5 business days) or wire transfer. If blocked, complete all KYC verification steps. Use the Help Center form or email support@gemini.com with details.

title: Customize Overflow is missing an important tool

Unfortunately, "Customize Overflow" is missing the MOST IMPORTANT tool for this process. How do you REMOVE existing items that clutter and make a mess of the few tool I actually use.

Please fix and make this a fully useful tool.

title: Firefox Just quit working
content:
I updated to the newest version of firefox the day it released and everything was fine until today 7-4-25. I logged onto my pc and it would not open. Task manager doesnt even recognize it as a program. So i restarted, still did not open, i refreshed with the installer still did not open. Set as run as administrator it opens but i get a white screen with all my tabs crashed out my settings are gone in firefox and i cant open anything in the options at all below is how my firefox looks no matter what i do. I have gone into command prompt and everything did a flush i went to check to see if the launcher was enabled it is enabled in the actual config but it comes up as disabled in the support page (and thats when I can get those to open they dont open all the time) I uninstalled and reinstalled three times. and yes i did a fresh install.


how my firefox screen now looks nothing works.....
